name: EICON TOWN
description:
EICON TOWN - A game managing the mini-economy of a small town. 

You win when you upgrade all 5 buildings to level 3.
Playtime ~30-40 min. Record time to beat is 22 days/cycles

TIP: Try to BUY green, SELL red.   Sometimes buying RED to invest in the store properly will help the store grow long-term.

Tutorial:
WSAD to move. LEFT-CLICK buildings to open its inventory
PRESS ANY BUTTON to close a text field
PRESS E to open the daily report
PRESS R to load a new day and trigger the stores' production
PRESS T to open the tutorial window
